subject: Baseball
World Series
Athletics and Sports
Fenway Park (Boston)
lead_paragraph: The Rockies have won 21 of their last 22, but do not have as much postseason experience or as much star power as the bigger-market and higher-paid Red Sox.
snippet: The Rockies have won 21 of their last 22, but do not have as much postseason experience or as much star power as the bigger-market and higher-paid Red Sox.
